OrgName: First Data Corporation and its controlled affiliates
activities: First Data collects and processes human resources data regarding applicants, employees and contractors for various purposes, including, but not limited to, compliance with laws, administration of employee benefits, and management of the employment relationship. Uses include payroll administration, recruitment and staffing, organizational and succession planning, merger, acquisition and divestiture planning and execution, performance evaluation and management, training, and access control and other security measures.
eucountries: Austria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Poland, Romania, Slovakia, United Kingdom
